data.title: 美国最高的模块化酒店，挑战设计和施工的难度！！
data.content: Concrete和Stephen B. Jacobs Group与DeSimone Consulting Engineers合作，完成了美国最高模块化酒店CitizenM Bowery的设计。这座21层高的建筑位于曼哈顿的下东区，面积约10万平方英尺，拥有300间模块化客房和各种酒店设施。其酒店包括一个屋顶酒吧，休息室，一个小酒馆风格的餐厅和地面层的共享空间，以及一个4000平方英尺的广场。Text description provided by the architects. Concrete Architectural Associates and Stephen B. Jacobs Group in collaboration with DeSimone Consulting Engineers, completed the design of CitizenM Bowery, the tallest modular hotel in the United States. Located in Lower East Side, Manhattan, the 21-story building measures approximately 100,000 square feet with 300 modular guestrooms and an assortment of hotel amenities. he hotel includes a rooftop bar and lounge, a bistro-style restaurant and coworking space on the ground level, and a 4,000-square-foot plaza.该项目是2014年纽约时代广场开业后的第二家市民酒店。This project is citizenM’s second hotel in New York, following the opening of their Times Square property in 2014.DeSimone的设计团队面临的挑战不仅要提供最高的模块化酒店，而且要将结构安装在最初为浇筑混凝土结构开发的建筑围护结构内，同时确保其符合当地的规范要求。DeSimone’s design team was challenged not only to deliver the tallest modular hotel in the United States, but also to fit the structure inside a building envelope originally developed for a cast-in place concrete structure, while ensuring that it met local code requirements.调整到模块化体系形成了一个由三个主要结构部分组成的分割建筑。从底层到四层仍然是现浇混凝土，以保留较低层先前设计的舒适空间。第四层的混凝土板厚36英寸，跨度可达38英尺，可用作支撑模块水平的转移板。15层的酒店模块从这个楼层升起。第19层至屋顶采用了结构钢框架，在以上楼层设施中提供开放空间。在整个建筑内，两个北侧模块之间的独立混凝土芯和叶片剪力墙充当建筑的横向系统。The switch to a modular system resulted in a divided building comprised of three main structural sections. The lowest section up to the fourth floor remained cast-in-place concrete to maintain a previously designed amenity spaces in the lower levels. The fourth-floor concrete slab is 36-inches-thick with spans measuring up to 38 feet that functions as a transfer slab to support the modular levels. The 15 stories of hotel modules rise from this floor. The nineteenth floor up to the roof is framed with structural steel to provide open spaces at the upper amenity levels. Throughout the building a standalone concrete core and a blade shear wall between the two northern modules act as the building’s lateral system.Executing设计和施工带来了额外的挑战。模块化现场连接必须承受高层建筑产生的巨大压力，提供足够的间距，避免与相邻模块的干扰，并提供在现场组装模块的空间。Executing design and construction created additional challenges. The modular field connections had to withstand large forces produced by a tall building, provide sufficient field tolerances, avoid interference with adjacent modules, and provide room to assemble the modules in the field.“我们很荣幸有机会参与这个独特的项目，”Benjamin Downing说。 “项目团队面临众多设计挑战，但我们迅速有效地解决了这些问题，以帮助实现全国最高的模块化酒店。”“We are honored to have had the opportunity to work on this unique project,” said Benjamin Downing, Managing Principal for Desimone in New Haven, CT. “The project team faced numerous design challenges, but we resolved these quickly and efficiently to help realize the tallest modular hotel in the nation.”场地平面图平面图立面图建筑师：Concrete + Stephen B. Jacobs Group地点：美国 曼哈顿面积：100000平方英尺合作、宣传、投稿请加小编微信：soujianzhu2关注微信公众号“搜建筑”或微信号“sjz9999”后，回复对应的数字或关键词，查看精品内容！！2018年全新回复：万科回复：1101或 1102 1103 1104 1105 1106 1110龙湖回复：1301或1302 1303恒大回复：1201规范回复：0901车库回复：1001或 1002高层办公回复：0101 或 0102 0103 0104 0106多层办公回复：0201 或 0202 0203 0204 0205综合体回复：0301 或 0302 0303 0304 0305 0307酒店回复：0401 或 0402 0403 0404 0405学校回复：0501 或 0502 0503 0504 05050507售楼处回复：0601或 0602博物文化展览馆回复：0701或 0702 0703 0704 0707图书馆回复：0801或 0802每周户型回复：0001或 0002 0003 0004 0005 0006
data.author: 搜建筑
